content: I've been making a lot of progress in my transition to a more plant-based diet over the past few months, and I've been experimenting with different types of milk alternatives. Oat milk has definitely become a staple in my pantry, and I love using it in smoothies and cereal. I've also been trying to cut down on dairy significantly, and I've replaced milk with oat milk and almond milk. I've even started making my own vegan yogurt using soy milk and a probiotic powder, which has been a game-changer.
